meanings.definition: To include (a song or songs) on a playlist.
meanings.sent1: I playlisted my favorite songs for the road trip.
meanings.sent2: She always playlisted upbeat music for her workouts.
meanings.sent3: The DJ playlisted the perfect mix for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her heart playlisted memories of their time together.
meanings.sent5: The teacher playlisted educational videos for the students.

meanings.definition: Having been added to a playlist.
meanings.sent1: The playlisted songs made the party more fun.
meanings.sent2: He was excited to see his favorite track playlisted.
meanings.sent3: The playlisted tunes set the mood just right.
meanings.sent4: Her playlisted songs were like a soundtrack to her life.
meanings.sent5: The playlisted tracks brought back nostalgic memories.
